extension.name: Markdown Text Formatter
extension.description: Text formatter that ships with Symphony

releases.release: - [#2094](https://github.com/symphonycms/symphony-2/issues/2094) Update Markdown (with HTML Purifier) to use Symphony's own `CACHE` folder.
- Update [HTML Purifier](http://htmlpurifier.org/) to 4.6.0 - Update [PHP Markdown Extra](http://michelf.com/projects/php-markdown/) to 1.2.8
- Update [HTML Purifier](http://htmlpurifier.org/) to 4.5.0 - Update [PHP Markdown Extra](http://michelf.com/projects/php-markdown/) to 1.2.7
- Update [HTML Purifier](http://htmlpurifier.org/) to 4.4.0 - Update [PHP Markdown Extra](http://michelf.com/projects/php-markdown/) to 1.2.5
- Bugfix to correctly use Markdown Extra parser when required instead of vanilla Markdown.
- Added back the "Markdown Extra" and "Markdown Extra with SmartyPants" formatters. The "Markdown with HTML Purifier" does not use the Extra or SmartyPants libraries.
- Using updated PHP Markdown library. v1.2.4 - Added [HTML Purifier](http://htmlpurifier.org/) v4.0.0 to help prevent XSS and other attacks on input
